name: Dawnclaw Ramparts
description:
Story:

As you begin your journey you are placed into the Dawnclaw ramparts you being  at the gate of the town and tasked with your first assassin's task which is to destroy some objects in the fastest time you can (Of course this role is optional.  if you choose not to follow this you will just roam around the town forever). I continue as you progress the small town is populated with cabins in a medieval style its a small fun experience designed for a few minutes  of fun play.

Features:

  • Bow shooting mechanic
  • Destructible's
  • Short simplistic story

Controls:

  • Movement = W,A,S,D
  • Space = Jump
  • Shift = Sprint 
  • Left click = Shoot arrow
  • Right Click = Zoom in

Supported: 

Windows 7, Windows 10

Requirements:

  • 800-megahertz (MHz) 32-bit (x86) processor or 800-MHz 64-bit  (x64) processor.
  • 512 megabytes (MB) of system memory. 
  • DirectX 9-class graphics card. 
  • 32 MB of graphics memory.
  •  Windows 7 +
